org.springframework.http.codec.json

类 Jackson2SmileEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.codec.json.Jackson2CodecSupport
      • org.springframework.http.codec.json.AbstractJackson2Encoder
        • org.springframework.http.codec.json.Jackson2SmileEncoder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.core.codec.Encoder<Object>, HttpMessageEncoder<Object>

    public class Jackson2SmileEncoder
extends AbstractJackson2Encoder
    Encode from an Object stream to a byte stream of Smile objects using Jackson 2.9. For non-streaming use cases, Flux elements are collected into a List before serialization for performance reason.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    另请参阅:
    Jackson2SmileDecoder
